verses.verse: And when He had come <WG1525> back <WG3825> to Capernaum <WG2746> several days <WG2250> afterward, <WG1223> it was heard <WG191> that He was at home. <WG3624>

And many <WG4183> were gathered <WG4863> together, <WG4863> so <WG5620> that there was no <WG3371> longer <WG3371> room, <WG5562> even <WG3366> near <WG4314> the door; <WG2374> and He was speaking <WG2980> the word <WG3056> to them.
And they came, <WG2064> bringing <WG5342> to Him a paralytic, <WG3885> carried <WG142> by four <WG5064> men. <WG5064>

And being unable <WG3361> <WG1410> to get <WG4374> to Him because <WG1223> of the crowd, <WG3793> they removed <WG648> the roof <WG4721> above <WG3699> Him; and when they had dug <WG1846> an opening, they let <WG5465> down <WG5465> the pallet <WG2895> on which <WG3699> the paralytic <WG3885> was lying. <WG2621>
And Jesus <WG2424> seeing <WG3708> their faith <WG4102> said <WG3004> to the paralytic, <WG3885> "My son, <WG5043> your sins <WG266> are forgiven. <WG863>"
But there were some <WG5100> of the scribes <WG1122> sitting <WG2521> there <WG1563> and reasoning <WG1260> in their hearts, <WG2588>
"Why <WG5101> does this <WG3778> man <WG3778> speak <WG2980> that way <WG3779>? He is blaspheming; <WG987> who <WG5101> can <WG1410> forgive <WG863> sins <WG266> but God <WG2316> alone <WG1520>?"

And immediately <WG2117> Jesus, <WG2424> aware <WG1921> in His spirit <WG4151> that they were reasoning <WG1260> that way <WG3779> within <WG1722> themselves, <WG1438> said <WG3004> to them, "Why <WG5101> are you reasoning <WG1260> about these <WG3778> things <WG3778> in your hearts <WG2588>?

"Which <WG5101> is easier, <WG2123> to say <WG3004> to the paralytic, <WG3885> 'Your sins <WG266> are forgiven <WG863>'; or <WG2228> to say, <WG3004> 'Arise, <WG1453> and take <WG142> up your pallet <WG2895> and walk <WG4043>'?

"But in order <WG2443> that you may know <WG3609> that the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> has <WG2192> authority <WG1849> on earth <WG1093> to forgive <WG863> sins <WG266>" – He said <WG3004> to the paralytic <WG3885> –
"I say <WG3004> to you, rise, <WG1453> take <WG142> up your pallet <WG2895> and go <WG5217> home. <WG3624>"

And he rose <WG1453> and immediately <WG2117> took <WG142> up the pallet <WG2895> and went <WG1831> out in the sight <WG1715> of all; <WG3956> so <WG5620> that they were all <WG3956> amazed <WG1839> and were glorifying <WG1392> God, <WG2316> saying, <WG3004> "We have never <WG3763> seen <WG3708> anything like <WG3779> this. <WG3779>"
And He went <WG1831> out again <WG3825> by the seashore; <WG2281> and all <WG3956> the multitude <WG3793> were coming <WG2064> to Him, and He was teaching <WG1321> them.

And as He passed <WG3855> by, He saw <WG3708> Levi <WG3017> the [son] of Alphaeus <WG256> sitting <WG2521> in the tax <WG5058> office, <WG5058> and He said <WG3004> to him, "Follow <WG190> Me!" And he rose <WG450> and followed <WG190> Him.

And it came <WG1096> about that He was reclining <WG2621> [at the table] in his house, <WG3614> and many <WG4183> tax-gatherers and sinners <WG268> were dining <WG4873> with Jesus <WG2424> and His disciples; <WG3101> for there were many <WG4183> of them, and they were following <WG190> Him.

And when the scribes <WG1122> of the Pharisees <WG5330> saw <WG3708> that He was eating <WG2068> with the sinners <WG268> and tax-gatherers, they [began] saying <WG3004> to His disciples, <WG3101> "Why <WG5101> is He eating <WG2068> and drinking <WG4095> with tax-gatherers and sinners <WG268>?"

And hearing <WG191> this, Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, "[It is] not those <WG3588> who are healthy <WG2480> who need <WG5532> a physician, <WG2395> but those <WG3588> who are sick; <WG2560> I did not come <WG2064> to call <WG2564> the righteous, <WG1342> but sinners. <WG268>"

And John's disciples <WG3101> and the Pharisees <WG5330> were fasting; <WG3522> and they came <WG2064> and said <WG3004> to Him, "Why <WG1223> <WG5101> do John's disciples <WG3101> and the disciples <WG3101> of the Pharisees <WG5330> fast, <WG3522> but Your disciples <WG3101> do not fast <WG3522>?"

And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, "While <WG1722> <WG3739> the bridegroom <WG3566> is with them, the attendants <WG5207> of the bridegroom <WG3567> do not fast, <WG3522> do they? So <WG3745> long <WG5550> as they have <WG2192> the bridegroom <WG3566> with them, they cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> fast. <WG3522>
"But the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064> when <WG3752> the bridegroom <WG3566> is taken <WG522> away <WG522> from them, and then <WG5119> they will fast <WG3522> in that day. <WG2250>

" No <WG3762> one <WG3762> sews <WG1976> a patch <WG1915> of unshrunk <WG46> cloth <WG4470> on an old <WG3820> garment; <WG2440> otherwise <WG7507> the patch <WG4138> pulls <WG142> away <WG142> from it, the new <WG2537> from the old, <WG3820> and a worse <WG5501> tear <WG4978> results. <WG1096>

"And no <WG3762> one <WG3762> puts <WG906> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into old <WG3820> wineskins; <WG779> otherwise <WG7507> the wine <WG3631> will burst <WG4486> the skins, <WG779> and the wine <WG3631> is lost, <WG622> and the skins <WG779> [as well;] but [one puts] new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into fresh <WG2537> wineskins. <WG779>"

And it came <WG1096> about that He was passing <WG3899> through <WG1223> the grainfields <WG4702> on the Sabbath, <WG4521> and His disciples <WG3101> began <WG757> to make <WG4160> their way <WG3598> along while picking <WG5089> the heads <WG4719> [of grain.]
And the Pharisees <WG5330> were saying <WG3004> to Him, "See <WG2396> here, <WG2396> why <WG5101> are they doing <WG4160> what <WG3739> is not lawful <WG1832> on the Sabbath <WG4521>?"

And He said <WG3004> to them, "Have you never <WG3763> read <WG314> what <WG5101> David <WG7035> did <WG4160> when <WG3753> he was in need <WG5532> and became hungry, <WG3983> he and his companions <WG3588>: <WG3326>

how <WG4459> he entered <WG1525> the house <WG3624> of God <WG2316> in the time <WG1909> of Abiathar [the] high <WG8> priest, <WG749> and ate <WG749> the consecrated <WG2068> bread, <WG4286> which <WG740> is not lawful <WG3739> for [anyone] to eat <WG1832> except <WG2068> the priests, <WG1508> and he gave <WG2409> [it] also <WG1325> to those <WG2532> who were with him? "
And He was saying <WG3004> to them, "The Sabbath <WG4521> was made <WG1096> for man, <WG444> and not man <WG444> for the Sabbath. <WG4521>
"Consequently, <WG5620> the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> is Lord <WG2962> even <WG2532> of the Sabbath. <WG4521>"
